<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3003</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Echoes and Reflections _a Multimedia curriculum on the Holocaust.LESSON 5-The Final Solution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Echos und Reflexionen _ ein Multimedialehrplan auf
der Holocaust.LESSON 5-The Endrunde Lösung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Échos et réflexions _ un programme d'études de 
multimédia sur la solution de finale de Holocaust.LESSON 5-The</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ecos e reflexões _ um curriculum dos multimedia 
na solução do final de Holocaust.LESSON 5-The</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Echi e riflessioni _ un programma di studi di 
multimedia sulla soluzione di finale di Holocaust.LESSON 5-The</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηχώ και αντανακλάσεις _ ένα πρόγραμμα σπουδών 
πολυμέσων στο ΜΑΘΗΜΑ ολοκαυτώματος η 5- τελική λύση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Generaciones de eco y reflexiones _ un plan de 
estudios de las Multimedias en la solución del final de 
Holocaust.LESSON 5-The</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is one of a series of lessons from the Multimedia curriculum on the holocaust.In this lesson,the learner discovers about the mobile killing squads, the Nazi extermination camps, and the “Final Solution of the Jewish Question.”</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">extermination camps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">final solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eins einer Reihe Lektionen vom 
Multimedialehrplan auf dem holocaust.In diese Lektion, der Anfänger 
entdeckt über die beweglichen TötungGruppen, die Nazi 
Ausrottunglager und die?Final Lösung der jüdischen Frage?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un d'une série de leçons du programme 
d'études de multimédia sur le holocaust.In cette leçon, l'étudiant
découvre au sujet des pelotons mobiles de massacre, des camps 
Nazis d'extermination, et de la solution de ?Final de la 
question juive ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é uma de uma série das lições do 
curriculum dos multimedia no holocaust.In esta lição, o learner 
descobre sobre os squads móveis da matança, os acampamentos nazi da 
exterminação, e a solução do?Final da pergunta jewish?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una di una serie di lezioni dal programma 
di studi di multimedia sul holocaust.In questa lezione, il 
principiante indaga sugli squads mobili di uccisione, sugli 
accampamenti Nazisti di sterminio e sulla soluzione di?Final della 
domanda ebrea?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια από μια σειρά μαθημάτων από το 
πρόγραμμα σπουδών πολυμέσων στο ολοκαύτωμα Σε αυτό το 
μάθημα, ο αρχάριος ανακαλύπτει για τις κινητές φονικές ομάδες, 
τα ναζιστικά στρατόπεδα εξολόθρευσης, και τη λύση ?Final της 
εβραϊκής ερώτησης;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Éste es uno de una serie de lecciones del plan 
de estudios de las Multimedias en el holocaust.In esta lección, el 
principiante descubre sobre las escuadrillas móviles de la matanza, 
los campos nazis de la exterminación, y la solución del?Final de la 
pregunta judía?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausrottunglager</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">abschließende Lösung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">camps d'extermination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solution finale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução do holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acampamentos da exterminação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">solução final</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione del holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">accampamenti di sterminio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">soluzione finale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση ολοκαυτώματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατόπεδα εξολόθρευσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">educación del holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campos de la exterminación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">solución final</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
